FuncDef: This command initiates tunnel setup for the specified LAN-to-LAN tunnel or for all static LAN-to-LAN tunnels in the specified tunnel group. This command initiates tunnel setup regardless of the configuration of theipsec-responder-onlycommand under the specified tunnel group.

ParaDef.Info: The ID of the tunnel group where all static LAN-to-LAN tunnels are initiated.
The name of the IPsec tunnel to be initiated.
